name: Soap On Rope with Sea Shells
description: Soap On A Rope,  a soothing soap perfumed with pure essential oils. Soap is embedded with a soft cotton rope for your convenience.  Packed with some  of our beautiful sea shells (jewels of the sea) found washed ashore.  Makes an unusual & unique gift.

name: Individual Soaps -  eg pictured Orange & Calendula
description:
A beautiful range of soaps packed with Tasmanian Bush Honey's organic oatmeal, Australian Clays & home grown herbs to impart colour, texture & soothing properties to nourish & benefit your skin.  Perfumed with pure essential oils.  
For more info on the different soaps available check out www.bluerockssoaps.com & the blue rocks soaps facebook page.
Rose & Petals,  Rose & Red Clay,  Spearmint & Cocoa Butter,  Lavender & Aloe Vera,  Oaty Lavender,  Oaty Bush Honey & Cinnamon,  Tangerine & Macadamia,  Lemon Gum Bush Honey & Seaweed,  Lemongrass & Aloe Vera,  Lemon Myrtle & Leatherwood Honey,  Lavender & Leatherwood Soother, Patchouli, Oaty Rosemary

name: Twin Gift Pack - 2  x 1/2 size cakes of soap
description: A great way to sample two of the Blue Rocks Soap range. Two guest soaps in a cellophane envelope for your convenience.  They make an unusual & popular gift.   Ideal small gift for postage overseas & a perfect traveling soap.  The two themes are Australian Bush (eg picture) or Floral.

name: Gift Pack x 6 Full Size Soaps
description:
Perfect for that special gift.  A selection of 6 full size soaps from the Blue Rocks range with themes of Floral(as pictured) or Australian Bush. *Note pack could contain a slightly different combination of soaps than shown.  Soaps weigh between 125g & 140g depending on the combination of ingredients used to create the different varieties.  
Blue Rocks Soaps is a home based business on Flinders Island, Tasmania making handmade soaps, inspired by the beautiful natural ingredients that surround us. More info on the Blue Rocks Soaps Facebook page or www.bluerockssoaps.com
